name: ts-blueprint
description: Package layouts for any type of package

scripts.build: pnpm run prepare:shiki && tsc --noEmit && vite build
scripts.prepare:shiki: mkdir -p public/assets/shiki && cp node_modules/shiki/dist/onig.wasm public/assets/shiki/onig.wasm && cp -r node_modules/shiki/dist/themes public/assets/shiki && cp -r node_modules/shiki/dist/langs public/assets/shiki
